drug_atorvastatin.name: Atorvastatin
drug_atorvastatin.warnings: Avoid grapefruit juice; report muscle pain.

drug_levothyroxine.name: Levothyroxine
drug_levothyroxine.warnings: Take on empty stomach 30-60 mins before breakfast.

drug_lisinopril.name: Lisinopril
drug_lisinopril.warnings: May cause dry cough; monitor blood pressure.

drug_metformin.name: Metformin
drug_metformin.warnings: Take with meals to reduce stomach upset.

drug_amlodipine.name: Amlodipine
drug_amlodipine.warnings: May cause swelling in ankles or feet.

drug_metoprolol.name: Metoprolol
drug_metoprolol.warnings: Do not stop abruptly; may cause dizziness.

drug_albuterol.name: Albuterol
drug_albuterol.warnings: Rescue inhaler; may cause rapid heart rate.

drug_omeprazole.name: Omeprazole
drug_omeprazole.warnings: Take before breakfast; do not crush tablets.

drug_sertraline.name: Sertraline
drug_sertraline.warnings: May take weeks for effect; avoid alcohol.

drug_gabapentin.name: Gabapentin
drug_gabapentin.warnings: May cause drowsiness; avoid driving initially.

drug_hydrochlorothiazide.name: Hydrochlorothiazide
drug_hydrochlorothiazide.warnings: Increases urination; take in the morning.

drug_sildenafil.name: Sildenafil
drug_sildenafil.warnings: Do not take with nitrates (heart medicine).

drug_furosemide.name: Furosemide
drug_furosemide.warnings: Monitor for dehydration and low potassium.

drug_pantoprazole.name: Pantoprazole
drug_pantoprazole.warnings: Swallow whole 30 mins before a meal.

drug_escitalopram.name: Escitalopram
drug_escitalopram.warnings: Monitor for changes in mood or suicidal thoughts.

drug_bupropion.name: Bupropion
drug_bupropion.warnings: Avoid if you have a history of seizures.

drug_amoxicillin.name: Amoxicillin
drug_amoxicillin.warnings: Complete the full course of treatment.

drug_dextroamphetamine.name: Dextroamphetamine
drug_dextroamphetamine.warnings: High potential for abuse; monitor heart rate.

drug_duloxetine.name: Duloxetine
drug_duloxetine.warnings: Do not stop suddenly; may cause nausea.

drug_prednisone.name: Prednisone
drug_prednisone.warnings: May increase blood sugar; take with food.

drug_tamsulosin.name: Tamsulosin
drug_tamsulosin.warnings: Take 30 mins after the same meal each day.

drug_ibuprofen.name: Ibuprofen
drug_ibuprofen.warnings: Avoid long-term use; can cause stomach ulcers.

drug_citalopram.name: Citalopram
drug_citalopram.warnings: Max 40mg/day to avoid heart rhythm issues.

drug_meloxicam.name: Meloxicam
drug_meloxicam.warnings: NSAID; monitor for stomach pain or dark stools.

drug_carvedilol.name: Carvedilol
drug_carvedilol.warnings: Take with food to minimize BP drops.

drug_potassium_chloride.name: Potassium Chloride
drug_potassium_chloride.warnings: Take with a full glass of water and food.

drug_tramadol.name: Tramadol
drug_tramadol.warnings: Risk of addiction; avoid other depressants.

drug_clonazepam.name: Clonazepam
drug_clonazepam.warnings: May cause dependency; do not mix with alcohol.

drug_montelukast.name: Montelukast
drug_montelukast.warnings: Report unusual behavioral or mood changes.

drug_fluticasone.name: Fluticasone
drug_fluticasone.warnings: Rinse mouth after use if using inhaler.

drug_venlafaxine.name: Venlafaxine
drug_venlafaxine.warnings: Monitor blood pressure; do not miss doses.

drug_warfarin.name: Warfarin
drug_warfarin.warnings: Regular blood tests needed; keep Vit K steady.

drug_apixaban.name: Apixaban
drug_apixaban.warnings: Do not stop without talking to a doctor.

drug_azithromycin.name: Azithromycin
drug_azithromycin.warnings: Check for heart rhythm issues if predisposed.

drug_quetiapine.name: Quetiapine
drug_quetiapine.warnings: May cause weight gain and drowsiness.

drug_ondansetron.name: Ondansetron
drug_ondansetron.warnings: Used for nausea; may cause constipation.

drug_allopurinol.name: Allopurinol
drug_allopurinol.warnings: Drink plenty of water; report any rashes.

drug_famotidine.name: Famotidine
drug_famotidine.warnings: Take 15-60 mins before eating trigger foods.

drug_oxycodone.name: Oxycodone
drug_oxycodone.warnings: High risk for addiction and breathing issues.

drug_estradiol.name: Estradiol
drug_estradiol.warnings: Discuss blood clot and stroke risks.

drug_latanoprost.name: Latanoprost
drug_latanoprost.warnings: May permanently change eye color to brown.

drug_alendronate.name: Alendronate
drug_alendronate.warnings: Stay upright for 30 mins; take with plain water.

drug_tizanidine.name: Tizanidine
drug_tizanidine.warnings: Can cause very low BP and sedation.

drug_baclofen.name: Baclofen
drug_baclofen.warnings: Do not stop abruptly; risk of withdrawal.

drug_methylprednisolone.name: Methylprednisolone
drug_methylprednisolone.warnings: Often used as a tapering dose pack.

drug_lamotrigine.name: Lamotrigine
drug_lamotrigine.warnings: Seek help immediately if a rash develops.

drug_doxycycline.name: Doxycycline
drug_doxycycline.warnings: Avoid sun; do not lie down for 30 mins after.

drug_pregabalin.name: Pregabalin
drug_pregabalin.warnings: May cause dizziness or leg swelling.

drug_sumatriptan.name: Sumatriptan
drug_sumatriptan.warnings: Use at first sign of migraine.

drug_finasteride.name: Finasteride
drug_finasteride.warnings: Pregnant women should not handle crushed pills.

drug_rivastigmine.name: Rivastigmine
drug_rivastigmine.warnings: Take with food to reduce nausea.

drug_donepezil.name: Donepezil
drug_donepezil.warnings: Usually taken at bedtime; can cause vivid dreams.

drug_ramipril.name: Ramipril
drug_ramipril.warnings: ACE inhibitor: watch for cough and BP.

drug_nifedipine.name: Nifedipine
drug_nifedipine.warnings: Avoid grapefruit; do not crush ER tablets.

drug_diltiazem.name: Diltiazem
drug_diltiazem.warnings: Check pulse; report slow heart rate.

drug_insulin_glargine.name: Insulin Glargine
drug_insulin_glargine.warnings: Rotate injection sites; monitor blood sugar.

drug_ciprofloxacin.name: Ciprofloxacin
drug_ciprofloxacin.warnings: Tendon rupture risk; avoid dairy near dose.

drug_naproxen.name: Naproxen
drug_naproxen.warnings: Take with food; monitor for stomach risks.

drug_methotrexate.name: Methotrexate
drug_methotrexate.warnings: Usually taken ONCE WEEKLY; avoid alcohol.

drug_levetiracetam.name: Levetiracetam
drug_levetiracetam.warnings: Report aggressive behavior or mood swings.

drug_folic_acid.name: Folic Acid
drug_folic_acid.warnings: Essential for cell growth; monitor B12.

drug_aspirin.name: Aspirin
drug_aspirin.warnings: Blood thinner alert; watch for bruising.

drug_propranolol.name: Propranolol
drug_propranolol.warnings: May mask symptoms of low blood sugar.

drug_clonidine.name: Clonidine
drug_clonidine.warnings: Do not skip doses (rebound high BP).

drug_loperamide.name: Loperamide
drug_loperamide.warnings: Do not exceed daily limit (heart risk).

drug_nitroglycerin.name: Nitroglycerin
drug_nitroglycerin.warnings: Sit before taking; may cause headache.

drug_gliclazide.name: Gliclazide
drug_gliclazide.warnings: Take with breakfast; monitor blood sugar.

drug_metronidazole.name: Metronidazole
drug_metronidazole.warnings: DO NOT drink alcohol during treatment.

drug_cephalexin.name: Cephalexin
drug_cephalexin.warnings: Notify doctor if penicillin allergy exists.

drug_lansoprazole.name: Lansoprazole
drug_lansoprazole.warnings: Take on empty stomach before a meal.

drug_nitrofurantoin.name: Nitrofurantoin
drug_nitrofurantoin.warnings: Take with food; urine may turn brown.

drug_isosorbide_mononitrate.name: Isosorbide Mononitrate
drug_isosorbide_mononitrate.warnings: Do not use with ED medications.

drug_doxazosin.name: Doxazosin
drug_doxazosin.warnings: Risk of fainting upon standing after first dose.
